channel.title: [PI] Adding potions
channel.description: Hi, I have been working on a blank Project Insanity base and I am having trouble adding potion drinking. Could someone please tell me everything needed to make potions drinkable? The potions class is implemented it just won't function for some reason.

item.title: [PI] Adding potions
item.dc:creator: @demoniczerk demoniczerk
item.description:
@demoniczerk wrote:

Could you please go into a little more detail? I’m not asking to be spoon-fed. I just need a bit off extra assistance. I’m not very familiar with Project insanity.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding potions
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Here’s what you need.

  1. Item option handler that handles drinking of potions
  2. When a “drink” packet is received, send it to the potion handler
  3. Have the potion handler process all necessary steps (drink checks, stat changes, etc)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding potions
item.dc:creator: @demoniczerk demoniczerk
item.description:
@demoniczerk wrote:

Hi, I have been working on a blank Project Insanity base and I am having trouble adding potion drinking. Could someone please tell me everything needed to make potions drinkable?
The potions class is implemented it just won’t function for some reason.

Read full topic
